name: Grant Sullivan
text: Great place for a fun family dinner or a get together with friends. The pizzas are made with high quality ingredients and the pretzel bites are phenomenal. Dining in the submarine is a must!

name: Hector Hernandez
text: Unique pizza, unique sandwiches, unique  drinks, unique decor! With 100% great flavor and taste. Make sure you mellow at the Mellow Mushroom.

name: Stromwogen1
text: Good beer selection, except they didn't have any Porters. They did have some excellent dark beers though. The pizza was delicious! They accidentally added thai sauce to mine, but were already making a new one as soon as they noticed. When ‚Ä¶More

name: Jesse Cole
text: Amazing decor and furniture in this place.  A true destination if you're a Beatles fan.  They have the best spinach artichoke dip around and the Maui Wowee pizza (not on printed menu-ask for it by name) is REALLY good.  Made with Caribbean jerk chicken and a pesto base... it's special

name: Christina Larson
text: Only thing good about this place was the napkins! Burned pizza, slow service when not during a peak time. Drinking glasses were dropped on the floor and put back without being washed or sanitized. Waitress was sweet and tried to make it right so she was tipped well. Do not recommend the food.

name: Greg Sloan
text: I loved this place . Definitely one of the most original themed restaurants I think I've ever been to in my life . It's part art museum , part restaurant and part bar somehow all mixed in to one . It's the type of place you must experience ‚Ä¶More

text: I placed a very large catering order, and the service was flawless.  I needed a receipt after the fact and had it in ten minutes.  Well run facility!!

name: Ben Shindeldecker
text: Love this place.  Happy hour is great prices and pretzel bites and wings are great.  Staff is always really friendly.

name: Noah Skapura
text: Horrible service, people before us got order first. Service not received until after 20 minutes and it was an hour before our first app alone was delivered. 3 plus hairs found in food and cold food. Manager Becka(spelling not for sure) was rude and offered no remorse to or problems. If manager Becka is on do NOT go, she should be fired.

text: I love their pizza dough, but being keto, the only pizza option available is crustless pizza, which is merely a bowl of pizza toppings. It‚Äôs not terrible, at least it‚Äôs an option, but I can‚Äôt believe they don‚Äôt have a cheese ‚Äúdough‚Äù option.

text: This was perhaps a great experience at this Lima location! We called and ordered ahead while we we're heading there before the volleyball tournament, and when we walked into the restaurant, the waiter let us know our food was about ready. ‚Ä¶More

text: OMG, the sunset paradise! Pizza, calzone, Burger...whatever you choose will be made to PERFECTION. And do NOT leave without trying an exotic drink! Virgin or alcoholic! Awesome atmosphere.

text:
Ashley was the best.... She made our night.  Food was yummy.
If I had a restaurant I would steal Ashley.

name: Joey Moisica
text: Mellow Mushroom is such a fun and creative place to eat, and their menu is unique as well! Obviously their pizza is a must-have, but I was also blown away by their soup and salad! If you're going for apps, you absolutely can't miss their bruschetta and pretzel bites with beer cheese. SO GOOD!!

text: My fianc√© and I finally stopped in after driving by the place many times on our various trips into town. It was around 9:00pm so we didn't incur any peak hour wait or crowd. Spacious open area, with a few smaller, cozy rooms as well. We sat ‚Ä¶More

text: Waited nearly an hour for our 1 pizza at around 2pm on a Tuesday . The vegetables were very fresh, pizza was hot and accurate but was not impressed.   Pizza was good, but not amazing as I anticipated.   The wait and cost for the pizza are not worth it and will not be revisiting

text: Good service. Good food but a bit pricey. $20 for a medium is a bit too much in my opinion. Staff was accommodating for my daughters bday to let us sit in the submarine.

name: john botton
text: I liked the meatball sub...

name: Cheri Black
text: My new love!!!! Absolutely great food, great service!!! Nice atmosphere! Will recommend and return for more!!!!

name: Nathan Hadding
text: If you're in a hurry go to Rapid Fired and you'll get a good pizza with standard toppings. If you have some time to kill go to Mellow Mushroom for a good pizza with some not-so-standard toppings. Service is good, ambiance is good, the ‚Ä¶More

name: Manuel Enriquez
text: I don't even know how this place stays in business mediocre food at best there are so many better restaurants around and pizza places if I were you I would stay away from here

name: Anita Good
text: Always great food and service.  So much detail in the construction of this place to make sure dining experience is unique.  We were in the yellow submarine.

name: Jerry Yarnetsky

text: First time here, underwhelmed. Stale salad ...straight out of a bag. Hoagie rather tasteless. Music unpleasantly loud. Pleasant staff though.

name: Jacqueline Degen
text: The food was great service could have been a bit better

name: Eric Hilyard
text: Awesome atmosphere! Great food. Good for kids and adults

name: Mike Clark
text: Always great pizza! Hadn't visited this location before.  Brand new, clean, and fun.  Great service as well.

name: Matthew
text: Great pizza, not very organized system for pick up orders.  Lost our pick up order then forgot about us as we waited for our food.  They were very busy though and the pizza tasted fantastic. This was my only experience so far.

name: Cameron Ruppert
text: Decent pizza.

name: Rodney Wagner
text: Was told an hour before we would be seated. Only took 20 minutes. About 45 minutes before we got appetizers from the time we sat down. Almost 2 hours before we got our pizza. Food was good service was good. Everyone was friendly that worked ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiff
text: Always love mellow mushroom while traveling, so happy we have one in lima now.  They have great pizza with vegetarian and vegan possibilities. They also have a nice drink menu. With all this they are still responsible on price.

name: Teresa Lamb
text: Pizza was one of the best we have ate. Service was great!

name: K K
text: Mellow mushroom not only exceeded my expectations in decor. But also friendliness and thoughtful staff whom seemed more mature than their ages. When I ate there I was in search of the owner to congratulate him on his amazing business but ‚Ä¶More

name: Idiot Fishing
text: Mellow mushroom is a unique pizza. It's high quality and you're going to pay a little extra but it's worth it.  Keep it simple. Not everyone will like it but it's my 2nd favorite pizza I've ever had.

name: Ethyn Dirmeyer
text: Very professional and high quality place. Food is very very fresh. The dough is shipped from Atlanta and is at MAX 48 hours old. Dr.Mooser  (owner) is such a nice man. Pizza is INCREDIBLE!!

name: Christian Weaver
text: Loved this place. Great food, didn't take to long to come out & it's the bomb. Great service, waitresses were very nice. I would recommend it to anyone & everyone.

name: Melodye Massey
text: Very few mushrooms on a pizza that was a MUSHROOM PIZZA. . Loaded potato pizza was good but I guess from how they cook it gritty black pieces all on the bottom. For the price not impressed.  They did make another small one and it did look like what we expected so revised review.

name: Steven Martin
text: Great pizza owned by a doctor.Also vegetarians  covered great food!!!

name: Cookie Ray
text: Fantastic staff, amazing food. I have never had a bad experience at Mellow!

name: JR Walker
text: Open atmosphere. A little noisy. Food was excellent and service very good. Had spinach artichoke appetizer, excellent. Had Maui Wowee pizza, very good. Would visit again.

name: Seth Thomas
text: Got a half and half pizza. Forgot the onions on one half. A slice of my side the crust was burnt black. Also forgot the garlic butter. Didn't get any napkins. Center of pizza was more like a soup texture with soggy crust that was ‚Ä¶More

name: Sebestian Segro
text: Nice being able to buy a bottle of wine. Good mushroom soup and a WIDE variaty of toppings for make your one pizza.

name: randall high
text: Food and atmosphere was terrific!

name: Alex Smith
text: A little pricey, but the food is good.

name: Christopher McClellan
text: Totally cool place.

name: D G
text: While prices are higher than some similar restaurants, the food is pretty good, and is made fresh.  Expect a long wait for your food- 30 to 40 minutes on a weekday, longer if it's busy.  There is special provision here for allergy needs, making this one of the few allergy-safe choices for dining out.

name: Leslie Buck
text: The food was great and the cocktails were even better , especially the price. Took  45 minutes to get our pizza though .

name: Heather Czompoly
text: The prices are too high, the burgers were dry. But I'd go back simply for the mushroom soup, it was AMAZING. Also the atmosphere and design of the place looks pretty darn cool!

text: Great experience,  phenomenal PBR dipping cheese for pretzel bites & crust. Good variety of beers!!

text: The pizza was just ok. They aren't very organized, had a pile of people waiting to get seated, plenty of seats available, and no hostess around for about 10 minutes, we nearly left. Nice ambiance, decorated well, plenty to look at. We'll probably go back, but not very often.

text:
I love the lunch specials. They start at $5.99
